description: Porter pulled me aside before the shoot and was a little nervous. “Did you really pair me with Randy. His dick is huge!” I laughed a bit. “It’s your turn Porter, good luck!” It took him a few minutes to accept that he was going to be plowed by one of the biggest dicks in the game. Once that happened he came over to talk a bit more. “Ok, we are gonna make this one the hardest fucking films I have ever done. It’s time to go big or go home!” Porter did just that. He took every inch of Randy like a champ. “How’s his hole Randy?” “It sure is the tightest one I have fucked here. It’s nice!”
title: Randy & Porter: Bareback
